content: lion brand pattern # 10382 *chs-laceybluesthrow pdf* skill level easy + level 3 790-329 homespun yarn waterfall 7 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm for edging gauge 10 sts = 4 inches 10 cm in double_crochet with larger sized hook square measures 11 inches 28 cm square work 20 squares sew 4 squares together to form strip sew 5 strips of squares together crochet picot edging to finish
